name: Mite
description:
Shoot through the hordes in an attempt to escape their reach.

Don't let the illusion of a full clip fool you: there's always one more of them than of your bullets.

In Mite you must clear stages full of undead and escape to the next area in hopes that you'll have what it takes to survive the sudden outbreak.

NOTE! I have much more to add to this! I have been limited by the free version of C2, and will be moving this project entirely to C3 sooner or later. There are many missing or unimplemented sounds and features present or left in 1.1b.
